00054 // lcd functions

00057 #define FCPU 11059200ul
00058 #define RS 0
00059 #define RW 1
00060 #define EN 2
00061 #define lcd_port PORTC
00062 
00063 #define sbit(reg,bit) reg |= (1<<bit)
00064 #define cbit(reg,bit) reg &= ~(1<<bit)
00065 
00066 void init_ports();
00067 void lcd_reset_4bit();
00068 void lcd_init();
00069 void lcd_wr_command(unsigned char);
00070 void lcd_wr_char(char);
00071 void lcd_home();
00072 void lcd_cursor(char, char);
00073 void lcd_print(char, char, unsigned int, int);
00074 void lcd_string(char*);

00086 void init_lcd()
00087 {
00088  DDRF = 0x00; 
00089  PORTF = 0x00;
00090  DDRA = 0x0F;
00091  PORTA = 0x00;
00092  DDRL = 0x18;
00093  PORTL = 0x18;
00094  DDRC = 0xFF;
00095  PORTC = 0x00;
00096  DDRJ = 0x00;
00097  PORTJ = 0xFF;
00098 }

00103 /*****Function to Reset LCD*****/
00104 void lcd_set_4bit()
00105 {
00106  _delay_ms(1);
00107 
00108  cbit(lcd_port,RS);    //RS=0 --- Command Input
00109  cbit(lcd_port,RW);    //RW=0 --- Writing to LCD
00110  lcd_port = 0x30;    //Sending 3
00111  sbit(lcd_port,EN);    //Set Enable Pin
00112  _delay_ms(5);     //Delay
00113  cbit(lcd_port,EN);    //Clear Enable Pin
00114 
00115  _delay_ms(1);
00116 
00117  cbit(lcd_port,RS);    //RS=0 --- Command Input
00118  cbit(lcd_port,RW);    //RW=0 --- Writing to LCD
00119  lcd_port = 0x30;    //Sending 3
00120  sbit(lcd_port,EN);    //Set Enable Pin
00121  _delay_ms(5);     //Delay
00122  cbit(lcd_port,EN);    //Clear Enable Pin
00123 
00124  _delay_ms(1);
00125 
00126  cbit(lcd_port,RS);    //RS=0 --- Command Input
00127  cbit(lcd_port,RW);    //RW=0 --- Writing to LCD
00128  lcd_port = 0x30;    //Sending 3
00129  sbit(lcd_port,EN);    //Set Enable Pin
00130  _delay_ms(5);     //Delay
00131  cbit(lcd_port,EN);    //Clear Enable Pin
00132 
00133  _delay_ms(1);
00134 
00135  cbit(lcd_port,RS);    //RS=0 --- Command Input
00136  cbit(lcd_port,RW);    //RW=0 --- Writing to LCD
00137  lcd_port = 0x20;    //Sending 2 to initialise LCD 4-bit mode
00138  sbit(lcd_port,EN);    //Set Enable Pin
00139  _delay_ms(5);     //Delay
00140  cbit(lcd_port,EN);    //Clear Enable Pin
00141 
00142  
00143 }
00144 
00145 /*****Function to Initialize LCD*****/
00146 void lcd_init()
00147 {
00148  _delay_ms(1);
00149 
00150  lcd_wr_command(0x28);   //LCD 4-bit mode and 2 lines.
00151  lcd_wr_command(0x01);
00152  lcd_wr_command(0x06);
00153  lcd_wr_command(0x0E);
00154  lcd_wr_command(0x80);
00155   
00156 }
00157 
00158   
00159 /*****Function to Write Command on LCD*****/
00160 void lcd_wr_command(unsigned char cmd)
00161 {
00162  unsigned char temp;
00163  temp = cmd;
00164  temp = temp & 0xF0;
00165  lcd_port &= 0x0F;
00166  lcd_port |= temp;
00167  cbit(lcd_port,RS);
00168  cbit(lcd_port,RW);
00169  sbit(lcd_port,EN);
00170  _delay_ms(5);
00171  cbit(lcd_port,EN);
00172  
00173  cmd = cmd & 0x0F;
00174  cmd = cmd<<4;
00175  lcd_port &= 0x0F;
00176  lcd_port |= cmd;
00177  cbit(lcd_port,RS);
00178  cbit(lcd_port,RW);
00179  sbit(lcd_port,EN);
00180  _delay_ms(5);
00181  cbit(lcd_port,EN);
00182 }
00183 
00184 /*****Function to Write Data on LCD*****/
00185 void lcd_wr_char(char letter)
00186 {
00187  char temp;
00188  temp = letter;
00189  temp = (temp & 0xF0);
00190  lcd_port &= 0x0F;
00191  lcd_port |= temp;
00192  sbit(lcd_port,RS);
00193  cbit(lcd_port,RW);
00194  sbit(lcd_port,EN);
00195  _delay_ms(5);
00196  cbit(lcd_port,EN);
00197 
00198  letter = letter & 0x0F;
00199  letter = letter<<4;
00200  lcd_port &= 0x0F;
00201  lcd_port |= letter;
00202  sbit(lcd_port,RS);
00203  cbit(lcd_port,RW);
00204  sbit(lcd_port,EN);
00205  _delay_ms(5);
00206  cbit(lcd_port,EN);
00207 }
00208 
00209 
00210 void lcd_home()
00211 {
00212  lcd_wr_command(0x80);
00213 }
00214 
00215 
00216 /*****Function to Print String on LCD*****/
00217 void lcd_string(char *str)
00218 {
00219  while(*str != '\0')
00220  {
00221   lcd_wr_char(*str);
00222   str++;
00223  }
00224 }
00225 
00226 /*** Position the LCD cursor at "row", "column". ***/
00227 
00228 void lcd_cursor (char row, char column)
00229 {
00230  switch (row) {
00231   case 1: lcd_wr_command (0x80 + column - 1); break;
00232   case 2: lcd_wr_command (0xc0 + column - 1); break;
00233   case 3: lcd_wr_command (0x94 + column - 1); break;
00234   case 4: lcd_wr_command (0xd4 + column - 1); break;
00235   default: break;
00236  }
00237 }
00238 
00239 /***** Function To Print Any input value upto the desired digit on LCD *****/
00240 void lcd_print (char row, char coloumn, unsigned int value, int digits)
00241 {
00242  unsigned char flag=0;
00243  if(row==0||coloumn==0)
00244  {
00245   lcd_home();
00246  }
00247  else
00248  {
00249   lcd_cursor(row,coloumn);
00250  }
00251  if(digits==5 || flag==1)
00252  {
00253   million=value/10000+48;
00254   lcd_wr_char(million);
00255   flag=1;
00256  }
00257  if(digits==4 || flag==1)
00258  {
00259   temp = value/1000;
00260   thousand = temp%10 + 48;
00261   lcd_wr_char(thousand);
00262   flag=1;
00263  }
00264  if(digits==3 || flag==1)
00265  {
00266   temp = value/100;
00267   hundred = temp%10 + 48;
00268   lcd_wr_char(hundred);
00269   flag=1;
00270  }
00271  if(digits==2 || flag==1)
00272  {
00273   temp = value/10;
00274   tens = temp%10 + 48;
00275   lcd_wr_char(tens);
00276   flag=1;
00277  }
00278  if(digits==1 || flag==1)
00279  {
00280   unit = value%10 + 48;
00281   lcd_wr_char(unit);
00282  }
00283  if(digits>5)
00284  {
00285   lcd_wr_char('E');
00286  }
00287  
00288 }

00291 void LCD_DISPLAY_INT_1(int val)
00292 {
00293 
00294 
00295  lcd_print(1,1,val,4);
00296 
00297 }

00299 /* reverse: reverse string s in place */
00300 void reverse(char s[])
00301 {
00302     int c, i, j;
00303     for (i = 0, j = strlen(s)-1; i < j; i++, j--) {
00304         c = s[i];
00305         s[i] = s[j];
00306         s[j] = c;
00307     }
00308 }
00309 void itoa1(int n, char s[])
00310 {
00311     int i, sign;
00312     if ((sign = n) < 0) /* record sign */
00313          n = -n;          /* make n positive */
00314     i = 0;
00315     do {       /* generate digits in reverse order */
00316          s[i++] = n % 10 + '0'; /* get next digit */
00317     } while ((n /= 10) > 0);     /* delete it */
00318     if (sign < 0)
00319          s[i++] = '-';
00320     s[i] = '\0';
00321     reverse(s);
00322 }
